description: black block lettering around image of Native American man on horseback holding guitar; drawing of talon gripping two thunderbolts coming down out of clouds around title at top
provenance: Paul Maurer, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2019.
title: Pow Wow, A Gathering of the Tribes for a Human Be-In, Lawrence Ferlinghetti, Allen Ginsberg, Timothy Leary, Jerry Rubin, January 14, Polo Grounds, Golden Gate Park
